articles.description: Qualcomm's yearly event has now passed and the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 is here!
articles.content: If all of this sounds like a tech speech smoothie, it can be summarized as: the times they are a changin. Recent rumors heavily point to the inclusion of the Gen 2 chip in phones such as the Samsung … [+557 chars]
